original_text: Before God gave his Law to Moses, people did wrong things. Sin was already there in the world. But at that time, God did not say that people were guilty, because there was no law for them to obey.
korean_text: 죄가 율법 있기 전에도 세상에 있었으나 율법이 없었을 때에는 죄를 죄로 여기지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Before God gave his Law to Moses,
Sin was already there in the world.
God did not say that people were guilty,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 사람들이 죄가 있다고 말씀하지 않으셨습니다,

sentences.original_text: because there was no law for them to obey.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 순종해야 할 율법이 없었기 때문입니다.
